It's OK, but I am looking for more powerful application and some other features, hence the ratinng. Many of my ToDos are on "As Soon As I Can Get To Them" basis. This app requires date and time due. I thought about using 12/31/9999 0:00. However, if I want to postpone some tasks, I have to change the due dates. Too much time required. I also do not see any way to sync or extract/ingest from other formats. So it is a "simple" ToDo, not what I need, you might be deliriously happy with it.
Very cool
Does what it says, works like it says. No complaints. Could use some features, but simplicity can be good when you're looking for easy first steps.

EDIT: Yeah I know all the problems caused by EMUI, it's really annoying but I've already tried everything :/ I love the app but it closes very often, leading to missing notifications... Pretty sad for a to-do list. I've done everything I could in the settings to prevent android from closing it but it doesn't work. I still give 3 stars because of the potential!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for the feedback! Traditionally Huawei and their Android customization called EMUI belongs to the most troubled on the market with respect to non-standard background process limitations. To fix this, try the tips from Huawei section on dontkillmyapp.com site. Hope these tips will help you :)
